BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST (STR_DEDUCTION_CODE,STR_DEDUCTION_TYPE,NUM_DED_PRIORITY,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_SLNO,NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST SET STR_DEDUCTION_CODE=?,STR_DEDUCTION_TYPE=?,NUM_DED_PRIORITY=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? ,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST T SET GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST (STR_DEDUCTION_CODE,STR_DEDUCTION_TYPE,NUM_DED_PRIORITY,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,GNUM_ISVALID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_SLNO, NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST (STR_DEDUCTION_CODE,STR_DEDUCTION_TYPE,NUM_DED_PRIORITY,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,GNUM_ISVALID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_SLNO, NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACTPAY_DED_PRI_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_DEDUCTION_PRI_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
